text:
One of the better buffet lunch and dinner is served in this restaurant, located within the Roxy Mercure Hotel at Parkway Parade.
The two times I visited were for lunch. The spread is great, and the food is fresh. My personal favourites include the Satay, Laksa, Roast Beef, Prawns, Steamed Fish and especially the Durian Pengat.
The staff were efficient and friendly, and definitely made dining here a pleasant experience.
It's very good value for money if you're an Accor member. Getting here is easy as the Marine Parade MRT literally stops outside the hotel.
Food quality is great! The service is wonderful! Very good value especially with accor plus membership vouchers. We will definitely be back again. Kudos to Mr Edison and his team!
Very happy to comeback for our family meal. Edison very patience n good excellent service. Food was hot n very tasty! Love the Korean stew n durian dessert a must !

Unparalleled service provided by Mr Eddy and Ms Kelly . Both very extremely attentive and helpful to diners and especially to elderly .
I was having dinner at the restaurant with my father and he wanted a ginger tea and Ms Kelly went all out to get the tea for my father . Even though she came back with ginger green tea, it was the effort that impressed me .
Thank you for the hospitality extended to me and my father .

Visited the place for 6th time a great place for buffet at the Roxy. The spread is pretty luxury and has food represented from every race and nationally. The staff is so friendly, and selection is great. I want to give a shout out to the Chief Chef Lesley for making super nice laksa and beef noodle üçú.
